testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin) I should be able to delete the announcement record in the system via API connection.
testcase.name: It must be verified via the API that the visitor purpose record that is requested to be deleted via
testcase.system-out: Given The api user sets "api/getNoticeById" path parameters.................passed When The api user prepares a GET request containing the 423 information to send to the api visitorsPurposeid endpoint..passed * The api user sends a GET body and saves the returned response.............passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "No id or wrong id. Please check your id number."..passed
